participant_1.background:
I enjoy playing with my husky after a long day of work.
I don't need to look my best to visit my mom.
I'm really excited to focus on my family and partner now that I've quit my job.
I love getting a good workout in and seeing my muscles grow.
I like the feeling of being in shape and being able to do well in races.

participant_2.background:
I'm white, but I have a love for fighting that runs deep in my soul.
I don't wash my clothes as often as I should.
I've started to write short stories in my spare time.
i shop several times a week.
I think my pets are the best things in my life.

content.text: Hey there! What are your hobbies?
I write short stories in my spare time and I love fighting
Oh cool! I like to write poetry. Fighting is intense - what's your favorite type?
I like boxing the best. I'm white, but I have a love for fighting that runs deep in my soul
I've never been much of a fighter, but I like boxing matches. I think they're so exciting!
I like the adrenaline rush and the challenge of it.
Do you ever spar with anyone?
I do! I have a sparring partner who's a lot better than me. It helps me get better
That's awesome! I'm glad you have a good sparring partner.
Yeah, me too! I'm not sure what I would do without him
I'm sure you're a great fighter! Do you have any fights coming up?
Not yet, but I'm hoping to get into some soon!
I'm sure you'll do great! Do you have any advice for someone who wants to learn how to fight?
Just keep practicing! That's all there is to it
